Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good news, <MYNAME>! A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've brought her here to introduce her
to you. You can come inside now!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah, did that surprise you,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is <BLUE>Michelle</BLUE>. She's going to be
living in town from now on!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm <BLUE>Michelle</BLUE>! Tell me, <MYNAME>. Did
you like my magic?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you! That was a new trick, so I'm
very happy you liked it!
<PAGE>
I'm a magician, and I lived here in this
town for a short while in the past. Now
I want to show off my magic here!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I decided that we finally need some
entertainments here in town, so I had
Michelle come and join us.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's all we wanted to say, anyway.
Sorry for coming by so early in the
morning. Keep up the good work!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You made such a cute little house for
me, I'll do my best to show off some
wonderful magic!
<PAGE>
I hope we'll get along, living together
in the same town! See you again soon.

A new person has come to the town! Let's
hope we become good friends!
<PAGE>
Magic... how cool is that? I hope I can
see some more soon!
